tool_description:
A single API for SMS, social messaging, and voice communication, with free inbound calls and messages. 
View outbound rates: https://www.apifonica.com/pricing/sms
Sign up for a free account: https://account.apifonica.com/register/
name: Apifonica
title: Apifonica

api_list.name: Get call info
api_list.description: Get the detailed info on the call: when, where to, duration, price, status, etc.

api_list.name: Get message info
api_list.description: Get the detailed info of the message sent: when, where to, price, delivery status etc.

required_parameters.name: accountsid
required_parameters.description: Your Apifonica account SID. Create a free account at account.apifonica.com/register/

required_parameters.name: messagesid
required_parameters.description: A unique identifier of the message

api_list.name: List of phone numbers by country
api_list.description: Get a list of numbers available for rent in a particular country
